description.name: 20 Ton Hydraulic Shop Press w/Gauge
description.long_desc:
Made from high quality steel with a powder coated paint finish to help corrosion resistance


Product Features



  • 20 tonnes of continuous pressing force

  • Smooth and safe operation

  • Single-acting cylinder that can deliver 145mm stroke through hand pump

  • Piston assembly is able to slide left and right

  • Large pressure gauge

  • Hard chromium-plated piston rod in pump

  • High strength powder coated steel H-frame

  • Adjustable working table offers nine height positions

  • Detachable pump and ram

  • Includes 2 press plates


Technical Data



  • Type: Hydraulic

  • Capacity: 20 tonne

  • Cylinder Stroke: 145 mm

  • Working Height: 9 positions

  • Gauge Included: Yes

  • Press Plates Dimensions: 190 x 100 x 25 mm


Package Contents:



  • 1x 20T Hydraulic Shop Press

  • 1x Pair of Press V Plates

  • 1x Handle



Dimensions

description.name: 20 Ton Air/Hydraulic Shop Press w/Gauge
description.long_desc:
Made from high quality steel with a powder coated paint finish to help corrosion resistance. The pressing ram head may be operated with either the hydraulic hand pump lever or the pneumatic pump. The pneumatic pump accelerates the ram head to the pressing point; the handle is then used to deliver maximum pressure when the full press capacity is needed.


Product Features



  • Air/hydraulic power system delivers up to 20 tonnes of continuous pressing force

  • Smooth and safe operation

  • Single-acting cylinder that can deliver 185mm stroke through hand or pneumatic pump

  • Piston assembly is able to slide left and right

  • Large pressure gauge

  • Hard chromium-plated piston rod in pump

  • High strength powder coated steel H-frame

  • Adjustable working table offers nine height positions

  • Detachable pump and ram

  • Includes 2 press plates


Technical Data



  • Type: Hydraulic

  • Capacity: 20 tonne

  • Cylinder Stroke: 185 mm

  • Working Height: 9 positions

  • Gauge Included: Yes

  • Press Plates Dimensions: 190 x 100 x 25 mm


Package Contents:



  • 1x 20T Hydraulic Shop Press

  • 1x Pair of Press V Plates

  • 1x Handle



Dimensions

description.name: 36" Body Moulded Car Creeper 6 Wheels
description.long_desc:
One piece, moulded polymer creeper with two integral tool trays and padded headrest. Used to allow easy access to the underside of vehicles without the aid of ramps


Product Features



  • One piece high impact polymer construction

  • Foam head rest for a comfortable laying position

  • Two handy tool storage trays

  • 6 caster wheels for great mobility

  • Maximum carrying weight 150kg

  • 900mm long x 400mm wide x 90 mm high

description.name: 80L Suction Oil Drainer with Chamber
description.long_desc:
Portable Oil Extractor is used to remove the oil from a vehicle's engine, gearboxes, rear axles without the need for getting under the vehicle to remove the oil drain plug.


Product Features



  • Height adjustable telescopic steel drain pan fitted with grid filter

  • Great mobility thanks to 4 wheels, 2 fixed and 2 pivoting

  • Carrying handle

  • Flexible suction pipes: dia. 5, 6, 7 and 8 mm

  • Metal sucting pipes: dia. 5 and 6 mm


Technical Data



  • Tank Capacity: 80L

  • Operation: Gravity / Suction

  • Pumping Speed: 0,8 - 1,6 l/min

  • Oil Temperature Range: 40 - 80°C

  • Oil Discharge Pressure: 1 - 2 bar / 14 - 28 psi

  • Air Inlet Pressure: 6 - 8 Bar

  • Air Inlet Connection: 1/4"

  • Inspection Chamber: 10L

description.name: Foldable Axle Stand (Pair) 2 tonne
description.long_desc:
2T Car Support Stands Set


This set includes foldable car stands with a 2-ton capacity.


These stands are used to support cars and other equipment after they have been lifted with a jack. They take up very little space when folded and have a safety pin for added security.


*Never use stands to support the front and back of a car simultaneously or only one side. Stands are intended to be used in pairs, and their weight capacity applies to a pair as well. To support a car, use one pair of stands. Do not exceed the maximum weight capacity of the stands.


Product Features



  • Three-level height adjustment: 275 - 365 mm

  • Foldable design

  • Take up minimal space when folded

  • Safety pin for added security

  • 2-ton weight capacity

  • CE, TUV, GS certifications


Technical Data



  • Weight Capacity: 2000 kg

  • Minimum Height: 275 mm

  • Maximum Height: 365 mm

description.name: Axle Stand (Pair) 2 tonne
description.long_desc:
2T Car Support Stands Set


This set includes very solidly constructed stands made from thick steel sheet with a locking mechanism that allows for very precise height adjustment at multiple levels.


They are used to support cars and other equipment after they have been lifted with a jack. These stands facilitate work in the workshop or garage, especially during tasks like tire changes and other car repairs.


*Never use stands to support the front and back of a car simultaneously or only one side. Stands are intended to be used in pairs, and their weight capacity applies to a pair as well. To support a car, use one pair of stands. Do not exceed the maximum weight capacity of the stands.


Product Features



  • Steel construction for solid durability

  • Equipped with a locking mechanism for height adjustment

  • Sturdy and stable

  • CE certified


Technical Data



  • Weight Capacity: 2000 kg

  • Minimum Height: 260 mm

  • Maximum Height: 400 mm

They are used to support cars and other equipment after they have been lifted with a jack. These stands facilitate work in the workshop or garage, especially during tasks like tire changes and other car repairs.


*Never use stands to support the front and back of a car simultaneously or only one side. Stands are intended to be used in pairs, and their weight capacity applies to a pair as well. To support a car, use one pair of stands. Do not exceed the maximum weight capacity of the stands.


Product Features



  • Steel construction for solid durability

  • Equipped with a locking mechanism for height adjustment

  • Sturdy and stable

  • CE certified


Technical Data



  • Weight Capacity: 3000 kg

  • Minimum Height: 290 mm

  • Maximum Height: 420 mm

description.name: Mini motocycle lift 500kg
description.long_desc:
Wzmacniany stojak motocyklowy pod przednią oś. Do produkcji wykorzystano stalową rurę o średnicy 32 mm malowaną proszkowo. Dodatkowo, wzmacniana konstrukcja stojaka gwarantuje stabilne i bezpieczne podnoszenie motocykla. Kółka wykonano z wysokiej jakości tworzywa ABS.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • Podnośnik wykonany został z materiałów najwyższej jakości.
  • Do produkcji wykorzystano stalową rurę o średnicy 32 mm malowaną proszkowo.
  • Dodatkowo wzmacniana konstrukcja stojaka gwarantuje stabilne i bezpieczne podnoszenie motocykla.
  • Kółka wykonane zostały z wysokiej jakości ABS-u.
  • Stojak umożliwia podniesienie przedniego koła

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał: wzmacniana stal malowana proszkowo

Udźwig: 270 kg

Średnica rury: 32 mm

Wysokość: 350 mm

Wewnętrzny rozstaw uchwytów mocujących: 150 - 260 mm
